name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in high-performance SaaS solutions. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, I have a strong focus on web architecture, web performance optimization, and user interface design. My capability in **database design** and **web server optimization** ensures quality outcomes while maintaining compliance with industry standards. 

With a proven track record in cross-functional collaboration and mentoring, I excel at problem-solving, effective communication, and adaptability in dynamic environments. I leverage modern technologies and frameworks to build robust applications that meet the needs of users while enhancing overall user experience.

- Adapting and maintaining code in line with industry best practices, ensuring that the applications meet and exceed current standards and user expectations.
- Implemented rigorous testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Postman**, achieving comprehensive coverage across unit, integration, and E2E tests, enhancing overall code quality by **30%**.
- Played a pivotal role in the successful launch of **8+** major product features within deadlines, contributing to improved user retention rates.
- Actively participated in Agile ceremonies and sprint planning, adapting to changing project requirements while delivering results on time.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to build dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **Tailwind CSS**, achieving responsive and performant user interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Enhanced web performance through effective **Web Architecture** and **Web Server Optimization**, leading to a **30%** improvement in loading times and user experience.
Collaborated cross-functionally with product and design teams to implement user interface designs that align with business goals and user needs, fostering a collaborative environment that resulted in a **25%** reduction in project delivery timelines.
Mentored junior developers on best practices in **Web Performance** and **User Interface Design**, improving team skill sets and driving quality standards across projects.
